name: jimmy's nightmare
description:
controls: arrow keys to move -- space to jump

a few months ago I quit my job to do something I like, although I am an avid gamer I didn't know anything about coding or creating sprites. Coded, designed and created the music by myself  thanks to twitter and YouTube pixel art community, I've learned a lot in a short time and  this is what I came up with in 2 months and still a work in progress. I grew up in snes and genesis era and  Im in love with retro games, I guess this work is a homage to creators of those games.
